module.name: Class of Service
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Class of Service allows you to limit access, per extension, to feature codes, trunks, queues, ring groups, etc.
module.changelog: *12.0.16* FREEPBX-8301 dont explode if contactmanager is not installed *12.0.15* Add Contact Manager groups. *12.0.14* Skip CoS checks on ALL external calls *12.0.13* Check for sysadmin first before attempting to ask for license *12.0.12* Resolve issue with DIDs with no Routes causing crash *12.0.11* Licensing updates *12.0.9* Add Time Condition and Day/Night Toggle support. *12.0.8* Change Feature Codes to display name *12.0.7* Ensure 'Reload' bar is triggered. *12.0.6* Initial Release
